abstract: Yahoo may have settled a proxy battle with activist investor Carl C. Icahn, but another activist investor is furious and may yank support for the company’s top executives at Friday’s annual meeting, The New York Post reported.
lead_paragraph: Yahoo may have settled a proxy battle with activist investor Carl C. Icahn, but another activist investor is furious and may yank support for the company’s top executives at Friday’s annual meeting, The New York Post reported.

headline.main: Yahoo Investor May Withhold Votes for Management, Report Says
